title: #056 – Jeremy Cowart on Art, Work, & Passion
itunes:title: #056 – Jeremy Cowart on Art, Work, & Passion
description: This week I interview Jeremy Cowart, an award-winning photographer, artist, and entrepreneur whose goal in life is to inspire and help others. Cowart talks about his multifaceted and ever-changing career and he gives advice to potential humanitarians and artists. We speak about his latest endeavor The Purpose Hotel, a planned global for-profit hotel chain designed to fuel the work of not-for-profit organizations as well as his new book “I’m Possible” which is coming out soon.
